sql.name: dwform.group
sql.item: select distinct g.c630000018 as groupname,g.c1 as groupid from {100} g,companyrel c where g.c1=c.companyrel_companyid and g.c630000027=2 and g.c630000021=2

sql.name: dwform.formtype
sql.item: select distinct f.c650000001,ar.schemaid from {100} f ,arschema ar where ar.name=f.c650000002

sql.name: hbeoms.dwdishi
sql.item: select distinct sysgroup.C630000018 as 地市 from {100} sysgroup where sysgroup.C630000021 = 2 and sysgroup.C630000020 <> 0 and sysgroup.c630000027 =1

sql.name: hbeoms.dwgongsideal
hbeoms.dwgongsiaccept
